title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in a soothing Blonde Ash color, designed with your comfort and convenience in mind. This elegant and practical piece of furniture is perfect for creating a dedicated workspace in your home or office. 

Crafted from sturdy medium-density fiberboard, this desk is built to last. The 59-inch width provides ample room for your computer, writing materials, and more, without taking up too much space in your room. With a beautiful Blonde Ash paper laminate finish, this desk isn't only functional; it's also a stylish addition to any room, blending seamlessly with your home decor.

Understanding the importance of organization and easy access, this desk features a total of four drawers. You'll find a slide-out keyboard tray to keep your desk surface clutter-free, three box drawers for office supplies, and a file drawer to neatly store your important documents. The drawers are built with the practical needs of everyday use in mind.

Durability is key for any piece of furniture, and this desk doesn't disappoint. It's both scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant, ensuring it stays looking new for years to come. And for your peace of mind, it meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, indicating it has passed rigorous testing for safety, durability, and performance.

Please note that some assembly is required, but don't worry—we've made it as straightforward as possible, and the result is well worth the effort! The desk is substantial in size and weight, so we recommend having a friend or family member help you set it up. If you need assistance or prefer professional service, in-home assembly is available; simply call our friendly customer service team at 866-388-4350.

Elevate your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan Manager's Computer Desk, where functionality meets elegance. Order yours today and enjoy a workspace that's as comfortable as it is beautiful.

Introducing the Realspace® Magellan Manager's Computer Desk in a lovely Blonde Ash finish, tailored for ease and comfort in your daily life. This desk, measuring a generous 59 inches in width, is crafted from sturdy medium-density fiberboard ensuring it's built to last. Designed with you in mind, this desk features a convenient slide-out keyboard tray for easy typing and four drawers to keep all your essentials neatly organized. The top drawer can hold your miscellaneous items, while the three box drawers take care of your stationery and tools. Moreover, the included file drawer is a perfect place to securely store your important documents.

Worry less about accidents with this desk's scratch-resistant and water-spill-resistant features, keeping your desk looking pristine for years to come. We understand that assembling furniture can be a hassle, which is why this desk is compliant with ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, assuring you of its quality and durability. While assembly is required, we offer an in-home assembly service. You can easily reach out to our friendly team at 866-388-4350 for assistance.

To ensure a smooth experience, please note that due to its size and weight, handling the desk may require an extra pair of hands. Whether you're updating your home office or enhancing your professional workspace, the Realspace® Magellan Manager's Computer Desk is the perfect blend of functionality and style.

Order yours today and experience the perfect balance of sophistication and practicality, designed to make your everyday tasks a little easier and a lot more enjoyable.

Introducing the Realspace® Magellan Manager's Desk, a timeless addition to your home or office, meticulously crafted to meet the needs of those who appreciate simplicity and functionality.

Constructed from durable medium-density fiberboard with a charming paper laminate finish, this desk is built for longevity.
